data.title: Currency Exchange Rate Calculator
data.meta_description: Mastercard currency converter tool calculates foreign exchange rates for all the major currencies worldwide to enable cross-border purchases and ATM transactions.
data.text: Every day, everywhere, we use our technology and expertise to make payments safe, simple and smart. This currency converter tool provides foreign exchange rates by Mastercard to convert from the transaction currency to your card's currency for cross border purchases and ATM transactions.
